title: Abraxas (1990 Action) starring Jesse Ventura | Space Guardian's Mission: Across time and space. 4K

sources.title: Abraxas (1990 Action) starring Jesse Ventura | Space Guardian's Mission: Across time and space. 4K
sources.description:
An adventure across time and space.
Intergalactic lawman Abraxas pursues his rogue ex-partner Secundus to Earth, where Secundus has fathered a child with Sonia Murray to unlock a universe-altering equation. Abraxas must protect Sonia and her son Tommy from Secundus's nefarious plans.

Original title: Abraxas, Guardian of the Universe (1990)

Director & Writer: Damian Lee

Main cast:
Jesse Ventura - Abraxas
Sven-Ole Thorsen - Secundus
Marjorie Bransfield - Sonia Murray
Francis Mitchell - Tommy Murray
Jim Belushi - Principal Latimer

Genres: Science Fiction, Action, Drama
Release date: March 1, 1991
Filming location: Ontario, Canada


00:00 Full movie with subtitles
05:15 Abraxas arrives on Earth to stop Secundus' destructive mission.
15:42 Secundus discovers Sonia and her mysterious child with immense power.
27:30 Abraxas confronts Secundus in a high-stakes battle of strength and will.
39:10 Sonia learns the truth about her son's unique abilities and destiny.
51:25 Abraxas faces a moral dilemma as he questions his mission's purpose.
1:05:40 Secundus unleashes chaos, forcing Abraxas to make a daring sacrifice.
1:21:00 Abraxas triumphs over Secundus and secures peace for Earth.
